sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import { assets } from '../assets/assets'; import { PlayerContext } from '../context/PlayerContext'; const Player = () => { const { track, seekBg, seekBar, playStatus, play, pause, time } = useContext(PlayerContext); return (

{track.name}

{track.desc.slice(0, 12)}

{playStatus ? ( ) : ( )}

{time.currentTime.minute}:{time.currentTime.second < 10 ? `0${time.currentTime.second}` : time.currentTime.second}

{time.totalTime.minute}:{time.totalTime.second < 10 ? `0${time.totalTime.second}` : time.totalTime.second}

); }; export default Player;
